website_summaries.verdict: Protects against rust without leaving a heavy film and can be used as a lubricant.
pros: Great for metal that gets exposed to salt water
Can also be used as a lubricant
cons: Doesn't get rid of rust that has already appeared

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product, used for rust prevention only
customer_reviews.text: A classic. This stuff doesn't penetrate rusted bolts. It doesn't "free up" stuck nuts or bolts. It doesn't "dissolve" rust. It doesn't even penetrate into threaded joints. But it DOES prevent rust from forming on anything that it's sprayed upon. That's what it does. It prevents rust. It doesn't correct it. Once you understand that, you'll be able to use it for what it was intended. It's a great product, used for rust prevention only. Don't count on it to do anything else. Spray it on nuts, threads, joints, supports, bushings, whatever. It is a great product for maintenance, but not for correction. Once you have a problem, this will not solve it. This is used for prevention only.
customer_reviews.author: Some Random Guy

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone around salt water environments!
customer_reviews.text: hands down the best protectant for exposed metal... I use it exclusively on my jetski engines and trailer, and even running salt all the time with proper rinse afterwards, metals usually corrode and rust within weeks. This stuff prevents any new and stops any existing dead in its tracks. Raw zinc winches 2 years later are still shiny, and new leaf springs (that usually rust within a week) don't have a spot of rust on them yet.....
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great, surprised more people don't know or use it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great, surprised more people don't know or use it. Have found all kinds of uses; sprayed the external gas meter to keep rust at bay, sprayed the back flow device on the sprinklers to stop corrosion. Sprayed spare tire rim and lowering mechanism under truck to stave off rust, and it works like a charm, believe it not. Stuff sticks like an adhesive, but will wipe off easily. Smells a little funky, but works well!
customer_reviews.author: Prof

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protection
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be an excellent lube/protectorate for metals. Goes on as sprayed and didn't drip. My only complaint is that the sticker was climbed over the instructions. And it would not be long. I had to soak it in warm water in order to grow sticker off. There is a better place on the camera for such a stinker, why they applied it here I have no idea. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better spray tip
customer_reviews.text: As far as a fluid goes, this stuff is pretty proven, not much can beat it for cost vs performance. But functionally, this spray tip is useless, it’s nearly impossible to get a nice even coat, The pressure isn’t high enough and the tip does not atomize at all. If your set up for hvlp spraying, go that route. Otherwise you’ll end up with an uneven coat and probably use more of it than you have to. And another thing, yes it does attract a lot of dust/grime. If using underneath a vehicle it will be pretty nasty once the fluid is embedded with grime.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Larson

customer_reviews.title: fluias coating performance
customer_reviews.text: I live on the gulf coast of Texas about 30 miles from the gulf. The humidity is always very high. I use this product to coat the machined surfaces on all of my machine tools. I can not begin to tell everyone how well it works protecting my machines. I First purchased a can of the about a year ago and cleaned all surfaces with Scothbrie then sprayed with this product. About once a month I wipe the surfaces with rag then apply a fresh coat. the water stands on on the surface but does not seam to penetrate. Now a year later i am purchasing a new can. I highly recommend this product to everyone, it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Tator

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible but works great
customer_reviews.text: Stays liquid during winter for salt protection. Smells nasty, like processed lanolin nasty (not VOC nasty), so make sure you spray in a ventilated area. Appears to use CO2 (or similar) as a propellant, which means it bubbles when applied. Personally, I think it has the added benefit of getting into the nooks and crannies.
customer_reviews.author: RationaleAndReason

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price for lawn mowers and lawn tractors....
customer_reviews.text: After finishing that God awful job of cleaning the mower deck on my lawn tractor I sprayed and wiped this on the under deck of the mower and wiped some on the freshly cleaned and sharpened blades. After 8 cuttings or so I'm thrilled that any bunched up grass and dirt isn't " caked " on the under deck and blades. It's great on the shoot also. Any debris on either can be easily wiped off instead of scraped. I plan to coat the under deck with this product when I put it away for winter storage. VERY PLEASED thus far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Muranyi

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a miracle in a can! Had a customer at work being a can to spray our sliding glass door that he saw me struggling with each morning. The door was so bad we thought it needed to be replaced! We had gone through multiple cans of WD40 in attempts to make it glide, but it never worked. ONE application of this and the door glides like new! I immediately ordered a can for my house, won't buy anything else again!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Used this to protect the bolt assembly at the top of my car's shock towers from rust. A design flaw channeled water runoff from the windshield to the top of my Subaru's shock towers. Rust was showing up on a two-month old car. On advice from a forum, I bought a can of Fluid Film and saturated the area after a thorough cleaning. No more rust! Now, over a year later, it is still rust free.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mack

customer_reviews.title: Use as a film protectant and you wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Although this says lubrication, it is NOT a penetrating oil, but a protectant that works well. Its lanolin based and works exactly for the use I bought it for. Will NOT free up rusted bolts or penetrate to help free up. Please use this as a corrosion inhibitor and protection from rust and you wont be disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: David J. Rice

customer_reviews.title: works great to stop and prevent corrosion on old cars
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped stop rusting on my old car in problem areas such as corners of doors, hinges, where metal pieces meet, undercarriage, wheel assembly and other hard to reach areas, including engine parts. I use it prophylactically about twice a year. It arrested the corrosion from a couple of damaged spots by my gas cap. Fully endorse and recommend it. Wish it was a bit cheaper though.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, easy to use and simple to get product right where you want it. We'll see how it protects over the next few months. I used it on screws which attach wheel tub liners on a truck. You have use self taping screws which go through inner body panels. I was able to put a good coating of this product around the end of screws without leaving a dripping mess on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Motoretro

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product at preventing frame rust on trucks.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using fluid film for a few years to protect my Tacoma's frame (which is notorious for rusting through). 3 years with using these cans to touch up the frame I have very little rust.The rust I do have gets a coat of Rustoleum and then gets a coating of fluid film for good measure. I think that the lanolin used in this product is much better for the environment than other methods, plus it sticks nicely and is tacky. Only minus to the product is smell.
customer_reviews.author: ccmclast

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic multi purpose product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Fluid Film for the purpose of keeping my truck's frame rust free. Fortunately I do not live in a salt state, but after reading some of the horror stories from those located in the Midwest and their success with Fluid Film, I decided it was cheap insurance. In the four years I've had the truck since new, I've applied two cans once every four months. Not a spot of rust yet. I've also found that Fluid Film works great for lubricating sliding doors, car doors, garage door tracks etc. This is a fantastic multi purpose product.
customer_reviews.author: David Silva

customer_reviews.title: Fluid film, a little pricier than other lubricant's, but, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Fluid film is a great product. I bought it to keep grass from sticking on the underside of my mowing deck,and it does a great job. It's also a rust prevenative and lubricant and you'll find that you will use it for anything around the house, and for all types of equipment that you may own. If you used WD-40 in the past, you'll never go back to it. Hundred's of review's are like mine, five star's all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile- scent is okay
customer_reviews.text: I have used it to protect rusting shock mounts and fasteners and clamps that seize with rust. The lubricating qualities are outstanding. I actually like the smell which does dissipate. Great on door, hood and trunk hinges. Overspray wipes off easily unlike white lithium grease which doesn't even work well. Forget about WD-40 (speaking of smelly)
customer_reviews.author: trutell

customer_reviews.title: great for show cows
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for its intended use but also has a great off-label use for getting rid of ring-worm on show cattle. It's lanolin based (comes from wool-bearing animals) and will smother the fungal infection within a week or two if applied daily. Great to see that hair growing back. try it out. it works
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Best rust protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of Project Farm on YouTube. After using it myself, I came up with the same results he did in his videos. It is the best for rust protection. This aerosol contains lanolin. It sprays out thick and it will separate if you don’t shake it. It really sticks to any surface you spray it on too.
customer_reviews.author: Zebrolova

customer_reviews.title: Unable to use
customer_reviews.text: Arrived missing spray tube. Wasted my time waiting over a week for it to get here, and now I can't use it. Quality Control lacking.
customer_reviews.author: H.F. Mudd

customer_reviews.title: Smelly stinky and so it must be good
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to apply under the car, good pressure inside the can. It smells horrible so make sure to use in well ventilated area..otherwise might make you feel sick. Once applied it sticks to the metal very well and does not run. It is a must have if you want your car to last a very long time in snow belt states that use salt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Good preventive maintenance.
customer_reviews.text: I'm taking rust prevention a lot more serious with my new (used) van. Along with KBS cavity wax, I'm using this in spots with moving parts. It got rid of the squeak in my new leaf springs. I spray it on all suspension bushings and steering linkage. I also sprayed some in the bottom of my door panels just cause.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: More useful than I thought it was going to be. Does a good job at preventing corrosion of iron and steel exposed to the weather, didn't try it on anything else. One can seems to last a long time. Will probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and unable to return it
customer_reviews.text: Folks, don't buy this stuff from Amazon. Mine arrived without the red spray nozzle. Not referring to the long attachment but the nozzle that comes directly attached to the can. Now I can't use the product and Amazon is saying that the product is not returnable. It's a total joke!
customer_reviews.author: Rommel

customer_reviews.title: Not good on woodworking cast iron table tops
customer_reviews.text: I read about this product from a woodworking site and got it to put a film on my bandsaw, tablesaw, and lathe to protect from rust. I cut some green wood and immediately cleared off the moist wood chips only to find a light layer of rust was started already. Just didn't protect at all. Cleaned this off my tools and returned to waxing the surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: ProfessorTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Lasts as long as  it's not exposed to rain - that seems to wash it off.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this to good success as long as it's not in direct exposure to rain or water which seems to wash it off. Of course if you don't buy from the manufacturer you never know if it's the real thing. I'm inclined to believe there is a lot of counterfit chemicals out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. I used this to loosen a few difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. I used this to loosen a few difficult door locks and squeeky hinges. This is not the same as silicone spray, but it can be used to achieve the same results for some applications. I'd say its more inline with 3-in-1 oil applications. I will try it next on my bike chains.
customer_reviews.author: MikeZ

customer_reviews.title: It is by far the best product I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Fluid film has all the comptetition beat. It is by far the best product I have ever used. Lubricates without drying out, and has so many uses. We have even used it on electronics that have lost their connections.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Bohannon

customer_reviews.title: Prevents rust
customer_reviews.text: Planning on wearing those women’s pants I bought and covering the underside of my new Silverado with this stuff. Curious how many cans I will need. Seems to work pretty well. Hopefully stops any rust from starting. We’ll see
customer_reviews.author: Mumbles

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for hedge trimmer blades
customer_reviews.text: Used on a hedge trimmer blade to keep it smooth and help reduce the resin that builds up on them. Worked well for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Man

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great product but for me its a bit over priced to use as they describe on a snow plow. I use it on the outside of my shotguns when I go duck hunting. Spray it on a rag wipe the outside down then put the rag in a zip lock bag for next the next use.
customer_reviews.author: rodney larson

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use this on the winch on my boat trailer and all moving parts on trailer and motor. I’ve gone out on the Long Island sound 3 times already and this spray stays on. It’s awesome highly recocomneed, I’ll be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Matty🚒

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite spray lubricant
customer_reviews.text: I love how the spray holds where you put it and runs very little. I use it on many items that are exposed to the elements and so far all still remain lubricated and rust free. I have not been using this product all that long now (3 months) but I feel very confident the lubricant will last for a very long time. It is now my new favorite spray lubricant and I have used a lot of different kinds over my 61 years.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Curry

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic stuff to undercoat your vehicle for rust preventative in new England weather!! Super slickery and stays put. Cleaned all rust off inside off jeep frame and sprayed whole undercarriage
customer_reviews.author: Pathtreker

customer_reviews.title: Best rustproofing solution I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: After 35 years of working on Michigan vehicles, this is the best rust preventative solution I have found. Some under carriage components need reapplication every few years.
customer_reviews.author: volvotech

customer_reviews.title: Finally found it
customer_reviews.text: My husband was trying to explain this to me and then after he showed me how it worked I understand wife he wanted to purchase it and have been looking for it for a while thank you great stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: m.a.demp

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is a mirical
customer_reviews.text: Use this stuff at home and work! It’s the greatest stuff, have literally submerged metal cables and Phillies with this stuff in it and weeks later not rust, reapply and it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff!!!!! I rarely use 3 and 1 One Oil anymore because this product soaks into the molecular skin surface of the material (metal, plastic, rubber etc.) and stays there. Lanolin is the magic oil and the sheep love to give up there wool once a year. This is all GOOD!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Fluid Film
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for preventing rust. I like the convenience of the spray can. It does leave a tacky film that seems to collect dust but has performed better than I expected as a corrosion inhibitor. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J I

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my jetski in salt water. Sprayed her down before getting to the ocean and the spray hasstayed on the engine after a full weekend of riding in the surf and multiple washings.
customer_reviews.author: Quinc

customer_reviews.title: Smelly but good product.
customer_reviews.text: Really like how the product works, but the smell is awful, and it doesn't go away. Other than that it's an excellent rust preventative and lubricant.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, sometimes better than Boeshield
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as protective as Boeshield, but still great. I find that this product gets deeper into parts than Boeshield, but seems slightly less protective. Get both, and you can decide which is best for your particular usage.
customer_reviews.author: STEM Guy

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the truck from rusting.
customer_reviews.text: Good product if you live in the north with the stuff they put on the roads here that will rust out your car this should help.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Vignali

customer_reviews.title: Works well, smells good
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great for corrosion resistance. The smell does attract bugs, though. Pretty easy price to pay for something a little more environmentally friendly.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Stays on even in the snow
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years on my snow plow. Seems to be semi waterproof and a coat a couple times over the winter does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Dave4047

customer_reviews.title: It's a multi-pupose spray.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to loosen nuts and bolts, also on my shotgun. The dirt doesn't seem to collect as bad as some of the other sprays.
customer_reviews.author: Lon Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great rust prevention and works even better for batter corrosion control. I keep a couple cans around for boat and garage.
customer_reviews.author: brodysdad

customer_reviews.title: Great product but found it for 1/3 the price at ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but found it for 1/3 the price at local home improvement store. Don't like the smell so I use it sparingly
customer_reviews.author: C. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: The best stuff ever for New England
customer_reviews.text: The best stuff ever for New England. Ended up buying a spray gun and a one gallon can of this stuff. Smells like New Zealand and makes me homesick!
customer_reviews.author: GJF

customer_reviews.title: Almost too good.
customer_reviews.text: Almost too good. I finally had to wipe down the areas where I put it. But it still remained slick.
customer_reviews.author: randyl42

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stuff I've ever seen. Sprayed under the bottom of my truck been there for a year still there protecting from rust
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but Effective.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but effective protection for lathe beds and all steel working surfaces in a humid work environment. Must clean work surfaces if workpiece can’t be stained or show residue from the protective film.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: You need this....
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely great product. Outstanding for that brand new car or truck you just purchased. A must for undercoating under that shiny new expensive car or truck. Also a must for your tools and anything that may develop rust.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Ramos

customer_reviews.title: WD-40 on steroids.
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Fluid Film. A little pricy but great. Fluid Film is great for work, automotive, and around the home. It works good and lasts. Use it on bike chain, battery terminals, door hinges and latch, and hood hinges and latch, plow hydraulic cylinders (when storing), and just about anything that you want to lubricate or protect against rusting. Fluid Film does leave a liberal layer and a little goes a long way. I hope this information helps.
customer_reviews.author: larry Blais

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Used for all kinds of things around the house; sprayed along my sliding patio door to keep if from freezing in the winter, sprayed under the lawnmower to prevent a lot of grass buildup, coated my snowblower chute and front end to prevent snow buildup and clogs, and also sprayed underneath my SUV to keep the salt build up down. Will be ordering more this spring!
customer_reviews.author: D A

customer_reviews.title: Best in class
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. I had lps 3 and stabil rust inhibitors. They work but this stuff is much less hazardous with no solvents! It works very good and is not expensive. I will be using this going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Pitty

customer_reviews.title: Could it really be so good?
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to see the impact over time, but here are the qualities i like: 1) Multipurpose: Used it on shoes, Bike chain, and my new Jeep Wrangler... 2) It has a smell initially, but quickly dissipates after a day. 3) does not gunk or blob like grease/oil. With this can it is spread evenly.. (also used a cloth though) If this product does in fact prevent rust and corrosion, keep away fleas/bugs, repel water, non-toxic, etc etc etc. Then i am going to soon start buying by the gallon!
customer_reviews.author: Sleeping Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for jeeps
customer_reviews.text: I spray this under my jeep every year. This helps with the rust and the North East winters. Just don’t spray on the muffler.
customer_reviews.author: Mark V.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is really great to use on all sorts of things! Great price also!
customer_reviews.author: Savy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I use it to winterize all of my tractor implements.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Best rust preventer you can buy for your vehicle.  Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Best rust preventer you can buy for your vehicle. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M

customer_reviews.title: The better lubricant and corrosion fighter.
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than you normal name brand products. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D

customer_reviews.title: Makes My Medeco Deadbolt Lock Feel More 'Expensive'
customer_reviews.text: I was previously using a dry lube (at a similar price) from the place that installed my Medeco lock and it worked well. Based on the way it feels in operation, this lube makes the lock feel as if it is more expensive and luxurious (believe it or not).
customer_reviews.author: maarvold

customer_reviews.title: ... a set of toolroom gage blocks and this was recommended by a tool and die maker
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of toolroom gage blocks and this was recommended by a tool and die maker. It is lanolin based and easier to clean off than old oil. I cleaned my 81 piece set and lightly lubed with Fluid Film. I am also trying it on some steel tools to prevent corrosion.
customer_reviews.author: Wayneka

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product used it to coat undercarriage of my truck for the winter. Super fast shipping highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Best spray lube out there
customer_reviews.text: Tried this stuff on a fluke a couple of years ago. It stays where is is sprayed and has no evaporative solvents as do some of the other products available. If it is protected from the environment (door jamb on car, for example) it is more or less permanent. Many uses, stops rust in its tracks, great for outdoor power equipment and anything else made of steel.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Deneen

customer_reviews.title: Nice and slippery!
customer_reviews.text: Very good lube! Better than WD40 on EGO bush trimmer, spray on after every use. No built ups!
customer_reviews.author: PAUL

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe I didn't find this sooner
customer_reviews.text: This is some great stuff. Gives a nice layer of protection to metal and other objects. Also helps clean up some dirt/grease.
customer_reviews.author: Annie P.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used this on many different things including spraying the bottom of my mower deck to keep grass clippings from sticking, freeing rusty bolts on my truck, lubricating bike chains and fixing noisy door hinges. In all the applications I've tried thus far this product is superior to other lubricating/protecting products. I highly recommend and will be buying more once this can is finished.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan E. Daggett

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tried a lot of sprays this stuff is by far better than them all combined!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works so good you will wonder how you got along with out it
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: good as advertised..
customer_reviews.text: just like most other review, Fluid film works as advertised. Time will tell how well it does it's job but from the time I've been using it I haven't noticed any issues with rust were applied.
customer_reviews.author: Sensei Dad

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Used it on all my tools when they got shipped overseas in a container. No rust at all. Does a great job. Sprays out pretty heavy, but you can wipe it down with a rag to leave just a thin film.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good rust prevention
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. So far working good especially for rust prevention.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Buckner

customer_reviews.title: amazing stuff and it really helps keep my jet ski from rusting on the inside !
customer_reviews.text: best stuff with no componds that will eat threw any the plastic and keeps thing nice and wet and rust free !
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: amazing stuff
customer_reviews.text: great for biners. LOVE THIS product, use it with all my adventures, , check me out on youtube: Joel Walker of the 828
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Walker

customer_reviews.title: best thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: we use this on the farm all the time . It is excellent on preventing rust and general corrosion on all types of metal . we use it all the time and it has saved us a lot of money by not having things rust away
customer_reviews.author: bill h wheat

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what's in it, but it works. Seems to stick to things very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great, my blades stay clean
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great, my blades stay clean, lubricated, smells better than Stihl's stuff and works better! I will by more next time!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Creative

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but the initial smell is not very pleasant. It goes away after awhile though.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: It works great at preventing rust and I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I've used fluid film before on the underside chassis of my suv.. It works great at preventing rust and I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ShoreD

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Seems to last longer and doesn't break ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Seems to last longer and doesn't break down as fast on exposed parts. I will use it for jobs where I need it and will continue to use others such as WD40 & Liquid Wrench where I think they would work initially better and may wrap up the project with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barb K.

customer_reviews.title: Spray it and it sticks
customer_reviews.text: This stuff stick for a very long time, great rust proofing spray.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN R

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is bar far the best product of it's type. I tried all the well known name brands but this is superior.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K

customer_reviews.title: Other better products available. This is like jelly.
customer_reviews.text: Works as long as you don't touch it. The Amsoil heavy duty metal protector has better anti-corrosion properties and sticks will with it's waxy coating so I'll just stay with it.
customer_reviews.author: Czech

customer_reviews.title: Great seller but the product really smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: The seller did a great job. It may just be me, but the product smells really bad. I would not buy it again for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: K. Galambus

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to spray under my mower deck to prevent grass from sticking. Seems to be working great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: It seems like I use a lot of Fluid Film. Probably because it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: Ed B

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I just applied the fluid film a few weeks ago. Appears to be effective...
customer_reviews.author: Gary H Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great for rust
customer_reviews.text: Works very good on rust. I used it for the bottom of my truck and it made the metal dart as if it was black again. It leaves an oil like texture on metal surfaces but that’s how it stops water from continuing to rust the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer W.

customer_reviews.title: 2nds ????....
customer_reviews.text: This product came with no lid on it a lid in the box that is for a hand sanitizer flip open lid.does not fit the can
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: Only word of advise I can say to people thinking about buying this is.. buy a case!!! You will use a single can the first day walking around your shop, property, farm, garage, ect. I use it on winches, winch cables, chains, snowplows, tools, all exposed/semi-exposed vehicle electrical connections, brush hog blades,, basically all my equipment that gets exposed to weather.. Kinda smelly, I think that's the lanolin componant, but WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use on electrical connections in an Oceanside setting to help prevent corrosion
customer_reviews.author: M. Moquin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product on our snowblower and it works wonders. I apply to the impeller and chute area at start of winter season. It not only stops ice buildup but keeps these areas from rusting due to road salt.
customer_reviews.author: William Worthman

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years on my trucks frame every fall and winter. Works well but need to reapply a few times over the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good gel aerosol
customer_reviews.text: Works good for tight spots on a travel trailer. Be sure to shake thoroughly. This works well to supplement the brush on gallon container.
customer_reviews.author: redfish3

customer_reviews.title: Little bit of an odd odor, but seems to work really well
customer_reviews.text: I like that this stuff is environmentally friendly and it seems to stick well wherever I spray it. I had no trouble spraying the entire can (i.e. no waste)
customer_reviews.author: K&M

customer_reviews.title: I would give it five stars but the straw that ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give it five stars but the straw that is pictured was missing. No big deal I have extras.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L Donato

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work pretty well. It will take a while to see how well a 'corrosion proof' coating will really work. So far, so good
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Mac

customer_reviews.title: Goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Want to help prevent rust on anything - buy this stuff! One can goes a long, long way.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Weir

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Covers think. Hard to give 5 stars until 6 months or so, but will update.
customer_reviews.author: speedbugy

product_meta.title: MowerPartsGroup Lubricant/Corrosion Inhibitor, 11.75 oz.
feature_bullets: Always active, does not dry out
Provides long term protection against corrosion
Provides superior lubrication and penetrates heavily seized parts
